Articles.Content: I am using the latest Beta Than Ever and the Control + Z is not working, this function is a very nice one and would like to see it working again for me in the new version, if there aren't many with this problem is a reinstall recommend for a quick fix?
You might want to explain exactly how you're trying to use it. It's very much still present, but it's been known to be a bit buggy under some conditions for reasons that really aren't at all clear.
I've placed a few panels together and removed them from my craft then clicked CTRL + Z and these items will not connect back to the craft, they won't even delete

If you're still 'holding' at least one part, I think the Undo function is temporarily disabled; as far as I know, all parts have to be placed or left floating before Undo will do much. Undo has also never (at least in stock) removed ghostly part copies -- it actually used to be used as a way to duplicate parts way back before the Alt-Click part duplication was implemented. They should, however, be reconnecting to the craft after you removed them, presuming that you don't currently have a part being held by the cursor.
